mainTask.title: HT-004: Hero Tasks System Enhancement & Modernization
mainTask.description:
Comprehensive enhancement plan to transform the Hero Tasks system from a great task management tool into a world-class productivity platform. This task implements advanced features including real-time collaboration, AI-powered insights, mobile optimization, and enterprise-grade integrations.

**Scope:** Full-stack enhancement covering UI/UX, backend services, database optimization, mobile experience, integrations, and enterprise features.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY across 4 implementation phases

**Expected Outcome:** A modern, scalable, AI-enhanced task management platform with real-time collaboration, mobile-first design, and enterprise integrations.

**Business Impact:**
- 300% improvement in task management efficiency
- Real-time collaboration capabilities
- Mobile-first productivity experience
- Enterprise-ready security and integrations
- AI-powered productivity insights

dependencies: Current Hero Tasks system (HT-001, HT-002, HT-003)

subtasks.title: Phase 1: Quick Wins & User Experience
subtasks.description: Implement immediate improvements that provide high value with minimal effort. Focus on keyboard shortcuts, drag-and-drop functionality, bulk operations, and task templates.

actions.title: Implement Keyboard Shortcuts
actions.description: Add comprehensive keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N for new task, Ctrl+E for edit, etc.)

actions.title: Drag-and-Drop Task Reordering
actions.description: Implement intuitive drag-and-drop for task prioritization and status changes

actions.title: Bulk Operations System
actions.description: Enable bulk status updates, assignment changes, and tag modifications

actions.title: Task Templates
actions.description: Create reusable templates for common task types (bug fix, feature, etc.)

actions.title: Export Functionality
actions.description: Add CSV, JSON, and PDF export capabilities for tasks and reports

subtasks.title: Phase 2: Real-time & Analytics Enhancement
subtasks.description: Implement real-time collaboration features, enhanced analytics, and performance monitoring to create a modern collaborative workspace.

actions.title: WebSocket Integration
actions.description: Implement WebSocket connections for real-time task updates and live collaboration

actions.title: Live Collaboration Features
actions.description: Show who's working on tasks in real-time with presence indicators

actions.title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
actions.description: Build burndown charts, velocity tracking, and productivity insights

actions.title: Time Tracking System
actions.description: Implement start/stop timers and automatic time tracking with reporting

actions.title: Performance Monitoring
actions.description: Add system performance monitoring and optimization alerts

subtasks.title: Phase 3: Mobile-First & Advanced Search
subtasks.description: Transform the system into a mobile-first experience with PWA capabilities, offline functionality, and advanced search/filtering systems.

actions.title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
actions.description: Convert to PWA with offline capabilities and native app-like experience

actions.title: Mobile-Optimized UI
actions.description: Redesign all interfaces for touch-first mobile interaction

actions.title: Offline Functionality
actions.description: Implement offline task management with sync when online

actions.title: Advanced Search System
actions.description: Full-text search across all task content with saved filters

actions.title: Query Builder Interface
actions.description: Visual query builder for complex multi-criteria searches

subtasks.title: Phase 4: AI-Powered Features & Integrations
subtasks.description: Implement cutting-edge AI features for intelligent task management and comprehensive ecosystem integrations.

actions.title: AI Task Intelligence
actions.description: Smart task suggestions, auto-dependency detection, and intelligent prioritization

actions.title: Natural Language Processing
actions.description: Natural language task creation and smart content parsing

actions.title: GitHub Integration
actions.description: Link PRs, commits, and issues directly to tasks with automatic sync

actions.title: Communication Platform Bots
actions.description: Slack/Discord bots for task notifications and quick actions

actions.title: Developer Tools Integration
actions.description: CLI tool and VS Code extension for seamless development workflow

subtasks.title: Enterprise Security & Scalability
subtasks.description: Implement enterprise-grade security, permissions, and scalability features for production deployment.

actions.title: Granular Permissions System
actions.description: Implement role-based access control with task-level permissions

actions.title: SSO Integration
actions.description: Add enterprise SSO support (SAML, OAuth, LDAP)

actions.title: Audit Logging System
actions.description: Comprehensive audit trail for all task changes and user actions

actions.title: Database Optimization
actions.description: Advanced indexing, caching layer (Redis), and query optimization

actions.title: Data Encryption & Security
actions.description: Encrypt sensitive data and implement advanced security measures

subtasks.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
subtasks.description: Comprehensive testing suite covering all new features with automated testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.

actions.title: Automated Test Suite
actions.description: Unit tests, integration tests, and E2E tests for all new features

actions.title: Performance Testing
actions.description: Load testing, stress testing, and performance benchmarking

actions.title: User Acceptance Testing
actions.description: Comprehensive UAT with real users and feedback incorporation

phase_1.focus: Quick wins and immediate user experience improvements

phase_3.focus: Mobile-first experience and advanced search (parallel with Phase 2)

technical_risks: AI integration complexity may require additional research time
Real-time features may impact database performance
Mobile PWA implementation may have browser compatibility issues
mitigation_strategies: Start with simple AI features and iterate
Implement database optimization early in Phase 2
Test PWA features across all major mobile browsers

success_criteria.phase_1: All quick wins implemented with 95% user satisfaction
success_criteria.phase_3: 70% mobile usage rate achieved within 1 month
success_criteria.phase_4: AI features providing 50% reduction in task setup time
